channel.title: Projects on Portfolio website for Shengwei Lai
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Portfolio website for Shengwei Lai

item.title: selected stocks in China A-share market
item.description: myStocks get data get stock prices of 7 China A-share companies and CSI 300 Index using tidyquant package myStocks <- c("600519.SS", "000651.SZ", "601318.SS", "600276.SS", "600585.SS", "000002.SZ", "600009.SS", "601398.SS", "002594.SZ", "000001.SS") %>% tq_get(get = "stock.prices", from = "2015-01-01", to = "2020-09-30") %>% group_by(symbol) name <- data.frame(name = c("Moutai", "Gree", "PingAn", "Hengrui", "Conch Cement", "Vanke", "Shanghai Airport", "ICBC", "BYD", "SSE Index"), symbol = c("600519.SS", "000651.SZ", "601318.SS", "600276.SS", "600585.SS", "000002.SZ", "600009.SS", "601398.SS", "002594.
